pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering of Functional Data via Mixtures of t-Distributions // Extension of 'funHDDC' Schmutz et al. (2018) doi:10.1007/s00180-020-00958-4 for cases including outliers by fitting t-distributions for robust groups. 'TFunHDDC' can cluster univariate or multivariate data produced by the 'fda' package for data using a b-splines or Fourier basis.
